resources.string:
Kwimpompo nganye ufumana amanqaku. Kodwa khumbula iibhaluni ziyagqabhuka ukuba uzimpompa kakhulu! 

Ukuba ibhaluni iyagqabhuka, awuyi kuqokelela amanqaku. 

Kufuneka ulinde ibhaluni elandelayo kwaye uzame kwakhona.

Ezinye zezi bhaluni zingagqabhuka emva kwempompo enye, ezinye zinokungagqabhukide zizalise isikrini sonke. Kuxhomekeke kuwe ukwenza isigqibo sokuba uyimpompa kangakanani ibhaluni nganye. \n\nZingaphi iimpompo ozithathayo ukuze igqabhuke le bhaluni? Yizame!
Unokuyeka ukupompa nangaliphi na ixesha ngokucofa iqhosha elithi \"QOKELELA AMANQAKU\". Yizame!

Okukhona uqokelela amanqaku kokukhona liya kuba phezulu ibhaso. \n\nKukho amabhaso amane: ibhaso elincinane, ibhaso eliphakathi, ibhaso elikhulu, kunye nebhaso lebhonasi. Isilinganisi-manzi siya kukubonisa ukuba usondele kangakanani kwinto nganye.
